医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的 ESC 指南整合了主动脉和外周动脉疾病的管理2024 年 ESC 外周动脉和主动脉疾病管理指南 (PAAD) 将这些血管疾病作为同一心血管系统的一部分进行评估，认识到主动脉疾病患者有患外周血管疾病的风险，反之亦然。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-ESC-guidelines-integrate-management-of-aortic-and-peripheral-arterial-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-ESC-guidelines-integrate-management-of-aortic-and-peripheral-arterial-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3272b9a6-e642-4df0-83a9-96e271c1e1e5 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 10:58:53 -0400 New ESC guidelines integrate management of aortic and peripheral arterial diseases
ESC共识声明强调肥胖对心血管疾病的影响在今年的 ESC 大会（英国伦敦，8 月 30 日至 9 月 2 日）上发表的 ESC 关于肥胖和心血管疾病的临床共识声明总结了肥胖流行病学和病因学的当前证据；肥胖、心血管危险因素和心脏病之间的相互作用；心脏病和肥胖症患者的临床管理；减肥策略，包括生活方式的改变、介入手术和抗肥胖药物，特别关注它们对心脏代谢风险和心脏结果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/ESC-consensus-statement-highlights-obesitys-impact-on-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/ESC-consensus-statement-highlights-obesitys-impact-on-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc3ef3bf-9757-46ca-987e-7cff12c9317e Fri, 30 Aug 2024 10:49:00 -0400 ESC consensus statement highlights obesity's impact on cardiovascular disease
芬兰研究显示 15 年内儿童死亡率降低 50%根据奥卢大学研究人员的一项研究，2005年至2020年间，16岁以下儿童和青少年的死亡率下降了50%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Finnish-study-shows-5025-reduction-in-child-deaths-over-15-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Finnish-study-shows-5025-reduction-in-child-deaths-over-15-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ad16060-cac6-481f-84d1-8f1d929cef59 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 10:39:03 -0400 Finnish study shows 50% reduction in child deaths over 15 years
评估基因疗法致癌风险新共识同行评审期刊《人类基因治疗》上的一篇新文章描述了参加评估基因疗法潜在致癌性会议的受邀专家达成的共识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-consensus-on-assessing-carcinogenic-risks-of-gene-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-consensus-on-assessing-carcinogenic-risks-of-gene-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df255f8a-e96e-4d14-bee2-0ebab68b3f18 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 10:33:59 -0400 New consensus on assessing carcinogenic risks of gene therapies
研究凸显媒体对 COVID-19 药物功效的歪曲维克森林大学医学院研究人员的一项新研究揭示了美国新闻媒体在 COVID-19 大流行初期如何描述科学证据和围绕三种未经证实的疗法的不确定性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Research-highlights-media-misrepresentation-of-COVID-19-drug-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Research-highlights-media-misrepresentation-of-COVID-19-drug-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f524cb3d-e964-44c7-87b8-f7d9b95473c4 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 10:19:32 -0400 Research highlights media misrepresentation of COVID-19 drug efficacy
家长保护孩子免受网络游戏风险的提示随着网络游戏成为儿童中越来越流行的消遣，家长们越来越担心孩子可能面临的潜在风险和危险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Tips-for-parents-to-safeguard-children-from-online-gaming-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Tips-for-parents-to-safeguard-children-from-online-gaming-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=838c219f-ac0c-4128-8871-014915689158 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 08:43:00 -0400 Tips for parents to safeguard children from online gaming risks
怀孕期间吸烟影响孩子的学业成绩吸烟几乎损害身体的每个部位。但如果你在怀孕时吸烟，烟草中的有毒化学物质也会伤害你未出生的婴儿，新的研究表明，这可能会导致学校学业成绩下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Smoking-during-pregnancy-affects-childrene28099s-academic-achievement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Smoking-during-pregnancy-affects-childrene28099s-academic-achievement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1fea98c-7fdf-49f4-bdba-ae7fc1d013c3 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 08:39:00 -0400 Smoking during pregnancy affects children’s academic achievement
新的指尖采血测试可能会彻底改变阿尔茨海默病的筛查全科医生很快就可以使用莫纳什大学工程师开发的简单手持设备来筛查患者的阿尔茨海默病（AD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-finger-prick-blood-test-could-revolutionize-Alzheimere28099s-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-finger-prick-blood-test-could-revolutionize-Alzheimere28099s-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c61ffee0-d15c-487d-bc71-8970b0d5446d Fri, 30 Aug 2024 08:35:00 -0400 New finger-prick blood test could revolutionize Alzheimer’s screening
Ingenza 宣布与 Cellugy 合作研究生物制造纤维素的潜力工业生物技术专家 Ingenza 很高兴地宣布，它正在与 Cellugy 合作，加速开发其用于生产生物制造纤维素的创新平台。该技术将为各种工业应用（从个人护理开始）提供化石石化产品的可持续替代品。新项目最终将加速对细菌纤维素生产的理解和优化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ingenza-announces-partnership-with-Cellugy-to-investigate-the-pottial-of-biofabricated-纤维素.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ingenza-announces-partnership-with-Cellugy-to-investigate-the-potial-of-biofabricated-纤维素.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83e2ffb9-a98e-4347-9931-efec654df1cb Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:19:00 -0400 Ingenza announces partnership with Cellugy to investigate the potential of biofabricated cellulose
重新定义 5hmC：不仅仅是 DNA 去甲基化途径的垫脚石一个重要的 DNA 修饰是甲基化，即在胞嘧啶的第 5 个碳上添加甲基。它形成 5-甲基胞嘧啶 (5mC)，通常与基因表达的抑制相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Redefining-5hmC-More-than-just-a-stepping-stone-in-the-DNA-demethylation-pathway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Redefining-5hmC-More-than-just-a-stepping-stone-in-the-DNA-demethylation-pathway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e12ccf3-7717-4fea-8d80-aeb8242a4c07 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:15:00 -0400 Redefining 5hmC: More than just a stepping stone in the DNA demethylation pathway
